column3: Description
Short name of the predictor variable
Unique identifier (V000) for each dataset
Long (full) name of the predictorvariable
One of pre-defined categories that can be used later on to classify the predictors
Name of the variable in the original data set
Name of the file downloaded
Name of the processed file as input for R script (to get to 1km grid)
Unit of the original data set
Value that indicates missing values, e.g. NA or 255 or -1000
Range of the values overall
Range of the values in Europe
Resolution of the original data set
Temporal resolution of the original data set (e.g. weekly or monthly or yearly data)
Projection or geographic coordinate reference system of the original data set
Time period
Future (F) or current (C) time period
Author and year of the publication or data set
DOI of the reference
Link to the data set to download
Is the variable included in the SDM Earthworm analysis?
Abbreviation of the person who downloaded the data
Date when original files have been downloaded.
If applicable, how was the original data transformed (combination of datasets, log-transformation etc.)
Was the original file re-projected to WGS1984 before it has been converted into the grid? (Yes, No)
Comment regarding the proper citation of the dataset
DOI number of the downloaded dataset
